data.title: Shahid Akhtar on LinkedIn: Urgent Requirement: Office Space in Mumbai. Client: Corporate Requirement:‚Ä¶
data.meta_description:
Urgent Requirement: Office Space in Mumbai.
Client: Corporate
Requirement: 35,000 Sqft stand-alone independent building or vacant plot of 1000-1500‚Ä¶
data.text:
Few instances of the organizations precisely tech companies who invested in Kolkata within past 6 months to 1 year. Undoubtedly the demand of the office spaces is enhanced noticeably. The city is growing better and better. So, requesting all the investors irrespective of product based and service based to utilize the investment opportunity in the city as soon as possible. Though it depends on the roadmap of each and every organization for the next few quarters. #globalinvestment #comeinvestinbengal #itsoftware #techcompanies #kolkata #kolkatajobs #foreigninvestment #softwarecompanies #softwarejobs #investment #kolkatainvestment #investmentopportunities #santaclara #california

This Video You will get detailed information about the Companies that have taken 1.5m Sqft of Office Space in Kolkata in the First 2 Quarters of this Year Only. You will Know some of the Big names that came to Kolkata and the Size of the Offices they Hired.

Mehul Thakkar #SeizeTheMoment India is a large country and each and every state , city and further sub locations of that city, is a different micro market in itself. The business dynamics are different. The developer's mindset is different. The consumption patterns are different. There are enough opportunities in each micro market of India. Its important to understand the size of the opportunity. It's important to understand the business dynamics of each micro market. Developers who will be financially disciplined and corporate governed, are bound to SeizeTheMoment . Link to my previous here on LinkedIn about the potential opportunity in Indian Real Estate. https://lnkd.in/drC2EBxn

Mumbai‚Äôs current stock stands at 147.8 mn sq ft, contributing to 19% of the total Grade A office stock in India. The city is likely to witness a healthy supply in the medium term with the maximum share by Navi Mumbai submarket followed by SBD North and Thane. üèôÔ∏è With healthy net absorption expected in the coming years, we expect vacancy levels to be range bound. The healthy supply pipeline indicates that there is enough space to cater to the demand while maintaining the balance among occupiers and landlords, though peripheral markets will account for a higher share of vacancy compared to core office corridors. üè¢ Check out our full report here: https://bit.ly/3wmRFiS ‚ú® #BengaluruMicroMarkets #SupplyTrends #PropShareResearch . . . . . . #FinancialFreedom #RealEstateMarket #PropertyInvestment #CommercialProperty #InvestmentOportunity #WealthCreation #RealEstateInvesting #InvestingOpportunity #CommercialRealEstate

If you live in chennai, and I have your contact number -there is 95% probability that I spammed you asking if you know anyone who might require such type of a cake at their event, celebration kind of stuff - because I messaged all 636 people I know one by one for 5 days asking if there's something required. Considering you people know me enough that sales is life blood of mine/the organisation I am part of...let me know if you want to get something on these lines. Trust me it will be a beautiful piece of art you can add and eat as well unlike the ones that only hang on walls or limited to decor alone and also the most important - you can show it as form of show off how much you love your loved one. #branding #sales #cake #desserts #chennai #fandb

The bottom three are the composition of the people so credit goes to them The top three is the reflection of the political will (while the people elect them, still). Eg. Singapore.. It can only be resolved with a very strong leadership at the top for 10 to 15 yrs or maybe more. Have any bright leaders in mind?
